InstructionData.Title: AC
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# ac control alias AC d0 alias GasSensor d1 alias Heater d2 alias HeatValve d3 alias CoolValve d4
alias temperature r0 alias poweron r1 alias setpoint r2 alias heating r3 alias cooling r4 alias highsp r5 alias lowsp r6
move setpoint 273.15 add setpoint setpoint 15 sub lowsp setpoint 1 add highsp setpoint 1
loop: #s AC Setting -200 l temperature GasSensor Temperature s db Setting temperature sgt poweron temperature highsp s CoolValve On poweron slt poweron temperature lowsp s HeatValve On poweron
s AC On 1 s Heater On 1 yield j loop
